title: How do i see all the help & support riot comments in the red tracker?
body: I have read that they did something so that there're not so many posts of help & support in red tracker, but i wanted to see those as well Q.Q

replies.body:
Since a lot of our answers tend to be about the same technical issues, a lot of players got tired of seeing the Help & Support responses in the red tracker. This way people are able to find the other posts much easier, but you're always welcome to come play with the poros over here in H&S!

{{sticker:sg-kiko}}

A rioter gave me a link to the unfiltered red tracker. Let me know if it's ok for me to repost the link, or I guess you have this too, lol. But yeah, I like seeing what people have issues with so that if I run across it I already have the answer.

That should be alright! Here's the link again just in case ^_^!

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/redtracker?test
sweet! well, I'm on the boards pretty often, so I will make sure to share the love if I see this pop up again :D. Thx Broporo!
